Title: Life in Paris

Apartment.Body: This is your quaint aparment in the center of Paris.

Outside Apartment.Body: As you step outside, you are met with a beautiful view of buildings with a rich history and the Eiffel Tower in the distance.

Eiffel Tower.Body: As you walk towards the Eiffel Tower you see a cute, quaint cafe.

Cafe.Body: The cafe is full of elegant decorations with baby pink accents. You sit down, order a matcha latte, and relax for a while reading your book.

Eiffel Tower Park.Body: As you head towards Eiffel Tower Park you take not of the beautiful lush greenery than encompasses it. Among the bushes that line the paths, you spot an object that sparkles when the light hits it.

Investigate Object.Body: Among further inspection, you realize the object is a tape recorder.

Choices.Text: Put the tape recorder back down.

Eiffel Tower Park2.Body: You take a moment to reflect on what you just heard, but decide to continue toward the Eiffel Tower.

Choices.Text: Go to the base of the tower.

Denied Access.Body: Upon walking up to the base of the tower, you see a man in a suit blocking the entrance to the stairs. He stops you as you approach and says 'Card please.' You realize you might have missed something earlier.

Choices.Text: Go back and investigate the recorder again.

Tape Recheck.Body: You kneel by the tape recorder once again. This time, you notice a hidden card tucked under it.

Card Collected.Body: You pocket the card, feeling a sense of progress. Time to head back.

Granted Access.Body: You approach the man yet again and when prompted, you give him the card. He examines it and gestures for you to enter.

Top of Tower.Body: You reach the top of the tower and are met with breathtaking views of Paris. You decide to take advantage of the champagne bar and spend the evening reading peacefully, taking it all in, and reflecting on the journey you've taken to get here.

End Message.Body: Thank you for playing Life in Paris. I hope you enjoyed and had a good time on your journey :)
